com.jrfom.gw2.api.model.colors

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jrfom.gw2.api.model.colors.Color

  • @Gw2ApiVersion(value="v1")
public class Color
extends Object
    Represents a color as returned by /v1/colors.json. This representation includes the color's numeric identifier as a property of the Color object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Color() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RGB getBaseRgb()
      Retrieve a triplet that represents the basic color value before it is modified with materials.
      MaterialColor getCloth()
      Retrieve details that describe how the base RGB (getBaseRgb()) is modified when it is applied to an in-game "cloth" material.
      int getColorId()
      Retrieve the color's numeric identifier.
      MaterialColor getLeather()
      Retrieve details that describe how the base RGB (getBaseRgb()) is modified when it is applied to an in-game "leather" material.
      MaterialColor getMetal()
      Retrieve details that describe how the base RGB (getBaseRgb()) is modified when it is applied to an in-game "metal" material.
      String getName()
      Retrieve the color's in-game name.
      void setBaseRgb(RGB baseRgb) 
      void setCloth(MaterialColor cloth) 
      void setColorId(int id) 
      void setLeather(MaterialColor leather)
